claim_summary: Arkansas Code §16‑10‑139 defines specialty court programs to include DWI courts, mental health courts, veterans courts, juvenile drug courts and HOPE courts; it requires that the Specialty Court Program Advisory Committee evaluate programs and that the Supreme Court approve specialty courts【470432877689858†L74-L121】.

source.title: Arkansas Code §16‑10‑139 – Specialty court program evaluation and approval
